answers.text:
Hi Mindy,
In reviewing their Performance Measurement Report, I found that the City of Arlington extensively measures their Information Technology services. Review the Department of Technology Services section of their report (Here: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/20439/Arlington_County_Performance_Measurement_Report) and I think you will find a great assessment of bases that should be considered while measuring the effectiveness of of IT services.  
Best,
James Davidson
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

title: IT Program Review
